Starstomp: No trouble, man! You think it will be long before we get 
back?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Quetzalcoatl::
> 
> Quetzalcoatl transformed quickly to his winged robot mode and before 
> Starstomp could fall he took her in his arms "If you don't mind" 
said 
> the male"it's safest for you and I can fly quickly at time..."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Starstomp: Hey!! Watch it out!!
> > 
> > She had nearly fallen off, but had the time to hold on and regain 
a 
> > good grip.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > Quetzalcoatl
> > > 
> > > "Hold on!!!" said Quetzalcoatl"It'll be fast"
> > > 
> > > Quetzalcoalt flew towards Chivtron's base.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Riding atop Quetzalcoatl, Starstomp receives the message.
> > > > 
> > > > Starstomp: Quetza, you got that? Something has to be totally 
> wrong 
> > > > back there. Think we should turn back and report our 
fieldtrip?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > > >       He glared at the monitor and shakes his head.  He 
opens 
> a 
> > > com 
> > > > channel to Windlord, Termitron, and the other original 
> Chivtrons 
> > > along 
> > > > with the Taurusoids.  "We're leaving now.  We're going to fly 
> out 
> > > of 
> > > > here.  It's no longer safe.  We're outnumbered and vastly 
> > > outgunned.  
> > > > When we leave I'm taking the Taurusoids to find Chaostaur.  
> > Someone 
> > > > must contact me with the location of our new base."
